name: The Coral
description: '''The Coral''' are an English rock band, formed in 1996 in [[Hoylake]] on the [[Wirral Peninsula]], [[Merseyside]]. The band emerged during the early 2000s. Their 2002 debut album ''[[The Coral (album)|The Coral]]'', from which came the single "[[Dreaming of You (The Coral song)|Dreaming of You]]", was nominated for the [[Mercury Music Prize]] and listed as the fourth best album of the year by ''[[NME]]''. Their second album, ''[[Magic and Medicine]]'' (2003), produced four UK Top 20 singles, including  "[[Pass It On (song)|Pass It On]]". In 2008, after guitarist [[Bill Ryder-Jones]] left the band, they continued as a five-piece.
